mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart (name, image, dish_id, dish_flavor, setmeal_id, number, create_time, user_id,amount) values (#{name}, #{image}, #{dishId}, #{dishFlavor}, #{setmealId}, #{number}, #{createTime}, #{userId},#{amount})
mapper.update: update shopping_cart set number = #{number} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from shopping_cart where user_id = #{userId} and dish_id = #{dishId}
delete from shopping_cart where user_id = #{userId} and setmeal_id = #{setmealId}
mapper.select: select * from shopping_cart where dish_id = #{dishId} and user_id = #{userId}
select * from shopping_cart where setmeal_id = #{setmealId} and user_id = #{userId}
